DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To evaluate morphological and functional characteristics of Irvine Gass syndrome Methods: 30 patients suffering on Cystoid macular edema (CME) secondary to Cataract surgery will be observed and evaluated by fluorescein-angiography, SD-OCT, reading performance, contrast sensitivity and microperimetry in a fixed time schedule
DOC.brief_title: Morphological and Functional Evaluation of Irvine-Gass Syndrome
DOC.criteria: > 18 years St.p Cataract surgery able to read informed consent with fluorescein angiography and SDOCT diagnosed Irvine Gass syndrome < 18 years CME of other origin diabetic macular edema
DOC.keyword: in vivo correlation of morphology and function
